item.title: Setting up LSP with emacs (2nd attempt)
item.description: guide https://www.mortens.dev/blog/emacs-and-the-language-server-protocol/ c++ and clang Do not use cquery. Apparently, clangd is better https://github.com/cquery-project/cquery clangd http://releases.llvm.org/download.html Download the pre-built binary. Without -background-index, it will only keep an in-memory index of the files that are active in Emacs buffers, but to be able to find references and symbols in any project file the background index is recommended. It is placed at the project root as the “.clangd” folder.
